recipes.label: Rush A Ritual for Quick Power
recipes.startdescription: If I bring the right trappings to a place with the right ambiance, I could perform a ritual to give myself great power. The actions I'd take might be...peculiar, and raise the suspicion of the general public.

recipes.label: Perform a covert Lantern Ritual in a Lofty Space
recipes.startdescription: I have brought my implements, and the atmosphere is charged and ready.

recipes.label: Perform a covert Lantern Ritual in a Lofty Space
recipes.startdescription: This ritual requires candlelight and mirrors and muttered prayers. I must be careful not to shine the light in anyone's eyes but my own.
recipes.description: Influence blossoms, music brightens. My soul aligns with the sun and stars in a secret constellation. Power arises from my footsteps.
